title: Core Features
subtitle: Comprehensive tools and services to polish your skills with mock interviews, psychometric tests, and real-time feedback.Enhancing your interview preparation journey with each step.

features.title: 1.Mock Interviews
features.description: 1:1 sessions with experienced professionals tailored to your industry and role

features.title: 2.Video-Based Interview
features.description: Submit your interview recordings and receive detailed expert feedback

features.title: 3.Psychometric Tests
features.description: Scientifically validated assessments for insights into your personality and cognitive abilities

features.title: 4.Real-Time Feedback
features.description: Get instant feedback on your performance to improve your interview skills quickly

features.title: 5.Exclusive Resources
features.description: Access premium study material and prep guides for all industries

features.title: 6.Personalized Coaching
features.description: Receive 1:1 coaching from HR experts tailored to your career goals and aspirations

cta.text: It only takes a few clicks to get started
cta.subText: Free for 14 days, no credit card required.
